## PBInsideFunctionScope.$choice() method

Creates a select statement: condition ? first : second

**Signature:**

```typescript
$choice(condition: ExpValueNonArrayType, first: ExpValueNonArrayType, second: ExpValueNonArrayType): PBShaderExp;
```
